Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.resources

Interface AnimationPlayback


  • public interface AnimationPlayback
    Controls animation playback.

    This class is used to play, pause, and stop an animation, and set the playback speed, repeat times, and weight for the animation.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  AnimationPlayback.State
      Enumerates animation playback states.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int REPEAT_COUNT_INFINITE
      Indicates that the animation keeps repeating.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      AnimationPlayback.State getPlaybackState​()
      Obtains the current animation playback state.
      int getRepeatCount​()
      Obtains the repeat times of the animation playback.
      float getSpeed​()
      Obtains the animation playback speed.
      float getWeight​()
      Obtains animation weight used for playing mixed animations.
      boolean isCompleted​()
      Checks whether the animation playback is complete.
      void release​()
      Releases animation playback data.
      void setPlaybackState​(AnimationPlayback.State state)
      Sets the animation playback state.
      void setRepeatCount​(int repeatCount)
      Sets the repeat times of the animation playback.
      void setSpeed​(float speed)
      Sets the animation playback speed.
      void setWeight​(float weight)
      Sets animation weight used for playing mixed animations.

    • Field Detail

      • REPEAT_COUNT_INFINITE

        static final int REPEAT_COUNT_INFINITE
        Indicates that the animation keeps repeating. This constant can be passed to setRepeatCount(int) to set infinite playback.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • release

        void release​()
        Releases animation playback data.

        After the animation playback data is released, the animation cannot be played any more.

      • setPlaybackState

        void setPlaybackState​(AnimationPlayback.State state)
        Sets the animation playback state.
        Parameters:
        state - Indicates the state to set, which is enumerated in State.

      • getPlaybackState

        AnimationPlayback.State getPlaybackState​()
        Obtains the current animation playback state.
        Returns:
        Returns the playback state.

      • setRepeatCount

        void setRepeatCount​(int repeatCount)
        Sets the repeat times of the animation playback. By default, animation playback does not repeat.
        Parameters:
        repeatCount - Indicates the repeat times to set. If you want the playback to keep repeating, set this parameter to REPEAT_COUNT_INFINITE.

      • getRepeatCount

        int getRepeatCount​()
        Obtains the repeat times of the animation playback.
        Returns:
        Returns the repeat times of the animation playback.

      • setWeight

        void setWeight​(float weight)
        Sets animation weight used for playing mixed animations.
        Parameters:
        weight - Indicates the animation weight to set. The value ranges from 0 to 1. 0.0 indicates that the animation will not be played, and 1.0 indicates that the entire animation will be played.

      • getWeight

        float getWeight​()
        Obtains animation weight used for playing mixed animations. The weight ranges from 0 to 1.
        Returns:
        Returns 0.0 if the animation will not be played; returns 1.0 if the entire animation will be played.

      • isCompleted

        boolean isCompleted​()
        Checks whether the animation playback is complete.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the animation playback is complete; returns false otherwise.

      • setSpeed

        void setSpeed​(float speed)
        Sets the animation playback speed. The default value is 1.0.
        Parameters:
        speed - Indicates the playback speed to set.

      • getSpeed

        float getSpeed​()
        Obtains the animation playback speed.
        Returns:
        Returns the playback speed.
